name: The Void (itch) (fasky)
description:
You wake up in a strange room with five doors, four of which are open. Travel through rooms based on the elements of Fire, Water, Earth, and Air in order to open the fifth door and claim whatever treasures lie within. Fight a variety of bosses to reach the end.

Many resources come from other sources, including Final Fantasy, Monster Hunter, Doom, Zombies Ate My Neighbors, and more.

A short game made for a class.

Instructions in-game.
